title: Zyras price went up during her sale?
body:
Zyra went on an rp sale recently and her ip price went  from 4800 to 6300, why did it increase after her ip reduction?

She still costs 440 rp which puts her in the 4800 category but I don't get it, why the ip increase?

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the heads up! Since she's on an RP sale, it goofed up her IP price in the catalog entry. ;-; We've gone ahead and fixed the IP price on her, and she's now appropriately labeled as 4800. :)
